text: vaṭṭi vāṅkuvatu avarkaḷukkut taṭai ceyyappaṭṭiruntum, avarkaḷ atai vāṅki vantataṉ (kāraṇamākavum,) tavaṟāṉa muṟaiyil avarkaḷ makkaḷiṉ cottukaḷai viḻuṅkik koṇṭiruntataṉ (kāraṇamākavum, ivvāṟu taṇṭaṉai vaḻaṅkiṉōm), ivarkaḷil kāḥpirāṉōrukku (maṟumaiyil) nōviṉai ceyyum vētaṉaiyaiyum nām cittappaṭuttiyuḷḷōm
